header.title: Defensive and offensive strategies
header.description: I’m getting started in the world of cybersecurity, and I’m passionate about learning how systems are protected from the inside out. I enjoy exploring new attack and defense techniques to understand how vulnerabilities arise and how to prevent them. I take every opportunity to keep learning and apply what I learn in projects or practical settings, aiming to build increasingly secure solutions.
